page.title: 17Village transport
page.content:
At Berwick St.James School, in the older class of twelve children, it was found that between them their families owned: 19 cars 6 motorbikes 42 bicycles
This need for an independent means of transport is understandable when the return bus fare to Salisbury (9 miles away) is now Â£1.60 and there are only five buses a day into the town with nothing after 6 p.m. It is almost impossible for teenagers to attend any evening event outside the village without the help of their parents' transport.
